bio.about: I started my journey in IT in 2012 by enrolling in university and participating in educational courses such as PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and more. From 2014 to 2021, I taught web design and programming in schools and training centers. During this time, I also worked on freelance projects in backend development, SEO, WordPress, and web design for domestic and North American companies. Over the past year, I focused on frontend development, gaining experience through two projects as an intern and junior developer. Iâ€™m eager to keep learning and growing in this field.

experiences.description: flight reservation platform with Next.js, MUI, StyledComponents, React, React Query, TypeScript.
Persian community of Mentors and Mentees to connect together. using Next.js, React, NextUI, Tailwind CSS, React Query.
